divs: Sighting Detailson July 18th 2010 at 21:25 i was sitting in my car in a Ralph's parking lot in burbank facing south. i saw the brightest light in the sky and it was green. i was staring right in its direction and it appeared out of no where. i know how high the mountains in the surrounding area are so i have a pretty good idea how high it was when i first saw it. it appeared out of no where at around seven thousand feet, and fell like a astroid to behind the hollywood sign mountain which is about two thousand feet. this all happened in ONE second, that is five thousand feet per second, or 3669 miles per hour. i was astonished. i asked my girlfriend if she saw it and she did not. so unfortunately i am the only whiteness
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Burbank
There were no other sightings in Burbank on or around July 18th 2010
